document.title: Pellete de liens du 16-09-2005
document.author: NiKo
document.text:
Voila une petite PHPelletee de liens
PRADO PHP framework - Home PRADO is a component-based and event-driven Web programming framework for PHP 5. (Tags: web php framework templates components dao )
Creole :: About Creole Creole is a database abstraction layer for PHP5. (Tags: php sql framework php5 abstraction )
Propel - Trac Propel is a full-service object persistence and query toolkit for PHP (Tags: php conception sql framework poo orm )
Seagull Framework :: Road Map Seagull is an OO PHP framework with the core modules licensed under BSD (Tags: php framework )
